title: DOODLEBUG Sugar Coating Glitter Assortment, 5 Gram Bottles, 12/Pkg
description: Variety is the spice of life, and this array of custom colored glitters in mini spice jars are perfect for the gourmet scrapper! Whether your layouts need a little bling, or you are working on an arts and crafts project, sugar coating glitter is guaranteed to stand out! Includes 12 colors: pink, magenta, dark orange, orange, yellow, lime green, aqua, dark blue, purple, iridescent, brown, and black. Each jar has its own secure cap. Each jar includes 5 grams. Imported.
